OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD SALARIED PRIMARY DENTAL CARE SERVICE

Desc.entry: Provides dental treatment for patients who have difficulty in obtaining treatment elsewhere. The service works in conjunction with local family dentists. SPDCS provides a service for people of all ages with special needs and elderly people. Treats housebound people without a family dentist, in their own homes. Adults and children who have a dental phobia and who need a special introduction to dentistry to prepare them for treatment by a family dentist, may access the service if they are referred by a Health or Social Care Worker. Dental health education may be provided for priority groups, held in locations throughout the city.
